lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Darman called for a "top level negotiation" between the White House and Congress on a budget compromise that would include asset sales, some excise taxes, cuts in middle-class entitlement programs, "a reasonable, steady rate of growth in defense" and reform of the budget process.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "You take the Taiwanese, with an enormous capital surplus, enormous trade surplus, and we've had very little cooperation there," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Texas senator said a series of excise taxes would be considered by Congress, including an extension of the telephone tax and new levies on liquor and cigarettes.
